summary: This is a simple mod that allows you to change the way Mirai looks. Just download the version you want and follow an easy installer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana]
[img]https://imageshack.com/a/img922/6734/zkVnXh.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=4][b][i][color=#93c47d]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/color][/i][/b][/size]


[color=#0A7A9B][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53867/?]Mirai - the Girl with the Dragon Heart [/url][/size]

[color=#38761D][size=6][b]SUPPORTS V2.02[/b][/size][/color]


[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Mirai looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes. If you want to change her hair I recommend one of these mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43673/?]Apachii Wigs[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?]The Hairstyler[/url].[/size]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3][b][u]Note. If any of the subfolders are named [color=#6aa84f][i]base[/i][/color] you need to move the content of that folder to the folder your swapping the textures to.
[/u][/b][/size]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. [i][color=#6aa84f]Base[/color][/i], [color=#6aa84f][i]FOMod[/i][/color] and [i][color=#6aa84f]Options[/color][/i]. Delete the [color=#6aa84f][i]FOMod[/i][/color] folder since you won't need it. Now go to the [i][color=#6aa84f]base[/color][/i] folder and select the bodytype you want and open the folders [color=#6aa84f]**Bodytype**, hands[/color] and [color=#6aa84f]feet[/color] and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\Mirai[/color][/i] Now go to the Options folder and choose a bodytexture. In each of the bodytexture folder there will be main folders (and some subfolders). As you may have guessed these go into the following folder [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Mirai[/color][/i]. Head textures goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Mirai\head[/color][/i], eyes go into [color=#6aa84f][i]textures\actors\character\Mirai\eyes[/i][/color] and teeth goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Mirai\Mouth[/color][/i][/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits
[/size][/color][size=3]If the name has no link on it its due to that mod has been delete[/size]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Mirai Customizer - CBBE - 1.4.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the new and better version of the framework for the installer
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Added support for latest version
Removed SeveNBase. You can easily install this yourself

files.name: Mirai Customizer - UNP - 1.4.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the new and better version of the framework for the installer
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Added support for latest version
Removed SeveNBase. You can easily install this yourself

files.name: Mirai Customizer - CBBE - 1.6F
files.changelogHtml:
Updated all textures to the latest version
Fixed several issues with the FOMod installer
Fixed an issue with the Mature set where the specular maps for the UNP were corrupt.
NOTE: This is the final update for this Customizer
